    • Vignette Title

Get Zengine API data

Source: R/zen.R
get_zen.Rd

get_zen() gets data from the Zengine API.

get_zen(resource, id = NULL, record = NULL, limit = NULL)

Arguments

resource

A character vector specifying a Zengine API resource. Common choices include "forms" and "workspaces". A full list of resources is available here. Defaults to "forms".
id

A character vector specifying a resource ID. Defaults to NULL.
record

A character or numeric vector specifying a record linked to a resource ID. The id argument must be provided if record is used. Defaults to NULL.
limit

An integer vector of the number of results returned on a get_zen() query. Defaults to NULL.

Value

A list of class zengine.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
